INVALID-ID-UPDATE: Invalid ID for update. Please try again!
INVALID-ID-DELETE: ID must be an array of number. Please try again!
INVALID-NAME: Invalid guess name. Guess name must be a string and not null
INVALID-ADDRESS: Invalid guess address. Guess address must be a string and not null
INVALID-PERSON-QTY: Invalid person quantity. Person quantity must be a number more than 0 and not null
